alert.note: Alert for Tohono O'odham Nation including Sells (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:12PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pima County through 500 PM MST... At 412 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Topawa, or 9 miles southeast of Sells, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sells, Topawa, San Miguel, Vamori, Cowlic, Choulic, Coldfields, Artesia, Hashan Chuchg, South Komelik, Itak and Ali Molina. This includes Route 86 between mile markers 107 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
